1  ABOUT BYOND
   -------------------------------------------------------------
   Ancient platform for multiplayer games. Free, but not open-
   source. Created by Tom and Dan in the mid-90s. If they had
   made an MMO instead of an MMO engine, they would be filthy
   rich and living like kings today. But no, they made this.
   
   It's not in active development, other than the webclient (no
   I don't know why, maybe Tom's not done chasing fairy tales).
   
   It's also really poorly documented, so this should help.
   -------------------------------------------------------------
   
2  DREAM DAEMON
   -------------------------------------------------------------
   Dream Daemon is a virtual machine that runs bytecode.
   It runs the server and handles basically everything.
   -------------------------------------------------------------
   
3  DREAM MAKER
   -------------------------------------------------------------
   Dream Maker is BYOND's included IDE. It's complete garbage.
   Included is a set of ideas/tools to help you avoid it. (TODO)
   -------------------------------------------------------------
   
2  Dream Seeker
   -------------------------------------------------------------
   Dream Seeker is the client. It does almost nothing other than
   the DirectX transforms (which will be our golden hammer).
   -------------------------------------------------------------
